bossDialog: (A small, fluffy creature hops back and forth on top of the treasure hoard, emitting small growls! As cute as it is, you get the feeling that it's not going to let you have the treasure of its own free will.)
(As you approach the treasure, a furry Carbuncle jumps out and barks at you several times! The commotion soon attracts more creatures, who seem to want the treasure for themselves!)
(The Carbuncle stares at you and growls, as it magically raises several gemstones into the air - the gemstones suddenly emit a bright flash and release creatures, who move to defend the Carbuncle!)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures deal 1% more damage for each spell they've cast.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures take 1% less damage for each spell they've cast.
cardBonuses.6: Doubles the potency of these effects.

master.dialog: Carbuncles - the creatures, mind you; not the pus-filled boils found on your underside - are a force to be reckoned with. After they've cast enough spells to power up, they're practically unstoppable. Here, I'll show you how it's done!
master.name: Uncle Carb

name: Carbuncle
